analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- "How It Works" Page Failed: Investigate why the "How It Works" page failed the test and ensure that the duration metric is being recorded.

issues.recommendation: Investigate why the "How It Works" page failed the test and ensure that the duration metric is being recorded.
The homepage has a longer load time compared to other pages, consider optimizing images or removing unnecessary elements to improve load time.

issues.message: TTFB (Time to First Byte) is relatively high for all pages
issues.recommendation: TTFB measures the time it takes for the server to respond to the client's request. Consider optimizing server-side rendering or caching to reduce TTFB.

insights: The pages are loading relatively quickly, with an average load time of 320ms.
The FCP (First Contentful Paint) metric is consistently low, indicating that the pages are rendering quickly and providing a good user experience.

The duration metric for the "How It Works" page is missing, which could indicate a potential issue with the page. It is important to investigate and resolve this issue to ensure consistent performance across all pages.
